root: ^I have this question on my test, 'Eyes are to sight as tongue is to what?'

res1: ^Taste is the right answer and the "best" answer.
^As my teacher %FullName:NPC:1% tells me this was one of two acceptable answers, but it was the best answer so it counted for more points on my test. Alright! I am happy with that.
res2: ^As my teacher %FullName:NPC:1% explains to me, this counts as an acceptable answer. So, it is technically right, though the answer that was better than speech was taste. I guess that makes sense.
res3: ^Kiss is the wrong answer and my teacher %FullName:NPC:1% even tells me it was the only unacceptable choice. So, that makes me feel even worse...
global decl: ^I have this question on my test, 'Eyes are to sight as tongue is to what?'
